targets.rawSql:
WITH flight_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'flight'
),
atc_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'atc' 
    AND t.callsign IN (SELECT DISTINCT c.callsign FROM controllers c WHERE c.facility != 'OBS')
),
frequency_matches AS (
    SELECT ft.callsign as flight_callsign, ft.frequency_mhz, ft.timestamp as flight_time
    FROM flight_transceivers ft 
    JOIN atc_transceivers at ON ft.frequency_mhz = at.frequency_mhz 
    AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ft.timestamp - at.timestamp))) <= 180
    WHERE (SQRT(POWER(ft.position_lat - at.position_lat, 2) + POWER(ft.position_lon - at.position_lon, 2))) <= 300
),
flight_records_with_atc AS (
    SELECT f.callsign, EXTRACT(HOUR FROM f.last_updated) as hour_of_day, COUNT(*) as records_with_atc
    FROM flights f 
    WHERE EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM frequency_matches fm 
        WHERE fm.flight_callsign = f.callsign 
        AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (f.last_updated - fm.flight_time))) <= 180
    )
    GROUP BY f.callsign, EXTRACT(HOUR FROM f.last_updated)
),
flight_records_total AS (
    SELECT callsign, EXTRACT(HOUR FROM last_updated) as hour_of_day, COUNT(*) as total_records 
    FROM flights 
    GROUP BY callsign, EXTRACT(HOUR FROM last_updated)
)
SELECT 
    fr.hour_of_day as time,
    ROUND((SUM(COALESCE(fa.records_with_atc, 0))::numeric / SUM(fr.total_records)::numeric * 100), 2) as percentage_with_atc
FROM flight_records_total fr
LEFT JOIN flight_records_with_atc fa ON fr.callsign = fa.callsign AND fr.hour_of_day = fa.hour_of_day
GROUP BY fr.hour_of_day
ORDER BY fr.hour_of_day;

panels.title: ATC Communication by Hour of Day

targets.rawSql:
WITH flight_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'flight'
),
atc_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'atc' 
    AND t.callsign IN (SELECT DISTINCT c.callsign FROM controllers c WHERE c.facility != 'OBS')
),
frequency_matches AS (
    SELECT ft.callsign as flight_callsign, ft.frequency_mhz, ft.timestamp as flight_time
    FROM flight_transceivers ft 
    JOIN atc_transceivers at ON ft.frequency_mhz = at.frequency_mhz 
    AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ft.timestamp - at.timestamp))) <= 180
    WHERE (SQRT(POWER(ft.position_lat - at.position_lat, 2) + POWER(ft.position_lon - at.position_lon, 2))) <= 300
),
flight_records_with_atc AS (
    SELECT f.callsign, EXTRACT(DOW FROM f.last_updated) as weekday, COUNT(*) as records_with_atc
    FROM flights f 
    WHERE EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM frequency_matches fm 
        WHERE fm.flight_callsign = f.callsign 
        AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (f.last_updated - fm.flight_time))) <= 180
    )
    GROUP BY f.callsign, EXTRACT(DOW FROM f.last_updated)
),
flight_records_total AS (
    SELECT callsign, EXTRACT(DOW FROM last_updated) as weekday, COUNT(*) as total_records 
    FROM flights 
    GROUP BY callsign, EXTRACT(DOW FROM last_updated)
)
SELECT 
    CASE fr.weekday
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Sunday'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Monday'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Tuesday'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Wednesday'
        WHEN 4 THEN 'Thursday'
        WHEN 5 THEN 'Friday'
        WHEN 6 THEN 'Saturday'
    END as time,
    ROUND((SUM(COALESCE(fa.records_with_atc, 0))::numeric / SUM(fr.total_records)::numeric * 100), 2) as percentage_with_atc
FROM flight_records_total fr
LEFT JOIN flight_records_with_atc fa ON fr.callsign = fa.callsign AND fr.weekday = fa.weekday
GROUP BY fr.weekday
ORDER BY fr.weekday;

WITH flight_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'flight'
),
atc_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'atc' 
    AND t.callsign IN (SELECT DISTINCT c.callsign FROM controllers c WHERE c.facility != 'OBS')
),
frequency_matches AS (
    SELECT ft.callsign as flight_callsign, ft.frequency_mhz, ft.timestamp as flight_time, at.callsign as controller_callsign
    FROM flight_transceivers ft 
    JOIN atc_transceivers at ON ft.frequency_mhz = at.frequency_mhz 
    AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ft.timestamp - at.timestamp))) <= 180
    WHERE (SQRT(POWER(ft.position_lat - at.position_lat, 2) + POWER(ft.position_lon - at.position_lon, 2))) <= 300
),
flight_records_with_atc AS (
    SELECT f.callsign, 
           CASE 
               WHEN c.position LIKE '%FSS%' THEN 'FSS'
               WHEN c.position LIKE '%CTR%' THEN 'CTR'
               WHEN c.position LIKE '%APP%' THEN 'APP'
               WHEN c.position LIKE '%TWR%' THEN 'TWR'
               WHEN c.position LIKE '%GND%' THEN 'GND'
               WHEN c.position LIKE '%DEL%' THEN 'DEL'
               ELSE 'OTHER'
           END as position_type,
           COUNT(*) as records_with_atc
    FROM flights f 
    JOIN frequency_matches fm ON fm.flight_callsign = f.callsign 
    AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (f.last_updated - fm.flight_time))) <= 180
    JOIN controllers c ON fm.controller_callsign = c.callsign
    WHERE c.facility != 'OBS'
    GROUP BY f.callsign, 
             CASE 
                 WHEN c.position LIKE '%FSS%' THEN 'FSS'
                 WHEN c.position LIKE '%CTR%' THEN 'CTR'
                 WHEN c.position LIKE '%APP%' THEN 'APP'
                 WHEN c.position LIKE '%TWR%' THEN 'TWR'
                 WHEN c.position LIKE '%GND%' THEN 'GND'
                 WHEN c.position LIKE '%DEL%' THEN 'DEL'
                 ELSE 'OTHER'
             END
),
flight_records_total AS (
    SELECT callsign, COUNT(*) as total_records 
    FROM flights 
    GROUP BY callsign
)
SELECT 
    fa.position_type as time,
    ROUND((SUM(COALESCE(fa.records_with_atc, 0))::numeric / SUM(fr.total_records)::numeric * 100), 2) as percentage_with_atc
FROM flight_records_total fr
LEFT JOIN flight_records_with_atc fa ON fr.callsign = fa.callsign
GROUP BY fa.position_type
ORDER BY percentage_with_atc DESC;

WITH flight_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'flight'
),
atc_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'atc' 
    AND t.callsign IN (SELECT DISTINCT c.callsign FROM controllers c WHERE c.facility != 'OBS')
),
frequency_matches AS (
    SELECT ft.callsign as flight_callsign, ft.frequency_mhz, ft.timestamp as flight_time, at.callsign as controller_callsign
    FROM flight_transceivers ft 
    JOIN atc_transceivers at ON ft.frequency_mhz = at.frequency_mhz 
    AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ft.timestamp - at.timestamp))) <= 180
    WHERE (SQRT(POWER(ft.position_lat - at.position_lat, 2) + POWER(ft.position_lon - at.position_lon, 2))) <= 300
),
flight_records_with_atc AS (
    SELECT f.callsign, c.controller_rating as controller_rank, COUNT(*) as records_with_atc
    FROM flights f 
    JOIN frequency_matches fm ON fm.flight_callsign = f.callsign 
    AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (f.last_updated - fm.flight_time))) <= 180
    JOIN controllers c ON fm.controller_callsign = c.callsign
    WHERE c.facility != 'OBS'
    GROUP BY f.callsign, c.controller_rating
),
flight_records_total AS (
    SELECT callsign, COUNT(*) as total_records 
    FROM flights 
    GROUP BY callsign
)
SELECT 
    CASE fr.controller_rank
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Observer'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Student'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Student 2'
        WHEN 4 THEN 'Student 3'
        WHEN 5 THEN 'Controller'
        WHEN 6 THEN 'Controller 2'
        WHEN 7 THEN 'Instructor'
        WHEN 8 THEN 'Instructor 2'
        WHEN 9 THEN 'Supervisor'
        WHEN 10 THEN 'Administrator'
        ELSE 'Unknown'
    END as time,
    ROUND((SUM(COALESCE(fa.records_with_atc, 0))::numeric / SUM(fr.total_records)::numeric * 100), 2) as percentage_with_atc
FROM flight_records_total fr
LEFT JOIN flight_records_with_atc fa ON fr.callsign = fa.callsign
GROUP BY fr.controller_rank
ORDER BY fr.controller_rank;

WITH flight_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'flight'
),
atc_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'atc' 
    AND t.callsign IN (SELECT DISTINCT c.callsign FROM controllers c WHERE c.facility != 'OBS')
),
frequency_matches AS (
    SELECT ft.callsign as flight_callsign, ft.frequency_mhz, ft.timestamp as flight_time
    FROM flight_transceivers ft 
    JOIN atc_transceivers at ON ft.frequency_mhz = at.frequency_mhz 
    AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ft.timestamp - at.timestamp))) <= 180
    WHERE (SQRT(POWER(ft.position_lat - at.position_lat, 2) + POWER(ft.position_lon - at.position_lon, 2))) <= 300
),
flight_records_with_atc AS (
    SELECT f.callsign, CONCAT(f.departure, '-', f.arrival) as route, COUNT(*) as records_with_atc
    FROM flights f 
    WHERE EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM frequency_matches fm 
        WHERE fm.flight_callsign = f.callsign 
        AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (f.last_updated - fm.flight_time))) <= 180
    )
    AND f.departure IS NOT NULL AND f.arrival IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY f.callsign, CONCAT(f.departure, '-', f.arrival)
),
flight_records_total AS (
    SELECT callsign, CONCAT(departure, '-', arrival) as route, COUNT(*) as total_records 
    FROM flights 
    WHERE departure IS NOT NULL AND arrival IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY callsign, CONCAT(departure, '-', arrival)
)
SELECT 
    fr.route as time,
    ROUND((SUM(COALESCE(fa.records_with_atc, 0))::numeric / SUM(fr.total_records)::numeric * 100), 2) as percentage_with_atc
FROM flight_records_total fr
LEFT JOIN flight_records_with_atc fa ON fr.callsign = fa.callsign AND fr.route = fa.route
GROUP BY fr.route
ORDER BY percentage_with_atc DESC
LIMIT 20;

panels.title: Top 20 Routes by ATC Communication Percentage

targets.rawSql:
WITH flight_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'flight'
),
atc_transceivers AS (
    SELECT t.callsign, t.frequency/1000000.0 as frequency_mhz, t.timestamp, t.position_lat, t.position_lon 
    FROM transceivers t 
    WHERE t.entity_type = 'atc' 
    AND t.callsign IN (SELECT DISTINCT c.callsign FROM controllers c WHERE c.facility != 'OBS')
),
frequency_matches AS (
    SELECT ft.callsign as flight_callsign, ft.frequency_mhz, ft.timestamp as flight_time
    FROM flight_transceivers ft 
    JOIN atc_transceivers at ON ft.frequency_mhz = at.frequency_mhz 
    AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (ft.timestamp - at.timestamp))) <= 180
    WHERE (SQRT(POWER(ft.position_lat - at.position_lat, 2) + POWER(ft.position_lon - at.position_lon, 2))) <= 300
),
flight_records_with_atc AS (
    SELECT f.callsign, COUNT(*) as records_with_atc
    FROM flights f 
    WHERE EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 FROM frequency_matches fm 
        WHERE fm.flight_callsign = f.callsign 
        AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (f.last_updated - fm.flight_time))) <= 180
    )
    GROUP BY f.callsign
),
flight_records_total AS (
    SELECT callsign, COUNT(*) as total_records 
    FROM flights 
    GROUP BY callsign
)
SELECT 
    ROUND((SUM(COALESCE(fa.records_with_atc, 0))::numeric / SUM(fr.total_records)::numeric * 100), 2) as overall_percentage
FROM flight_records_total fr
LEFT JOIN flight_records_with_atc fa ON fr.callsign = fa.callsign;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT callsign) as total_flights FROM flights;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records FROM flights;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT callsign) as total_controllers FROM controllers WHERE facility != 'OBS';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_transceivers FROM transceivers;
